task: Record a USD 15 lunch expense at a nearby café.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the lunch expense is successfully recorded in the app with all relevant details filled in.

Open the app again because the previous action led to closing the app

The previous textview indicating "還沒有資料喔~" and other financial summary widgets are no longer visible, suggesting a shift to a different interface or functionality.

After pressing the "BACK" button, the current screen now displays a text view with the message "還沒有資料喔~" indicating that no data is available, along with several buttons and text views related to financial tracking, which were not present on the previous screen. This change may be confusing for users as it shifts from a main app interface to a more specific financial summary without clear context.
Touch on a button that has resource_id "adder"

The action of touching the button with resource_id "adder" has transitioned the user from the main screen to the AddOrEdit screen, where new input fields and options for entering financial data are now available, including dropdowns for asset and category selection, as well as text fields for amount and notes. Additionally, a back button has been introduced for navigation back to the previous screen. (page changed from Main to AddOrEdit)
Touch on a textfield that has resource_id "amountEditor"
Jade Green pressed the back button because there was no interactable widgets

The textfield with resource_id "amountEditor" is now focused, allowing the user to input or edit the amount. Additionally, the current screen displays various buttons and textviews related to the transaction details, indicating an active interface for entering financial information.

Jade Green has encountered some confusion while navigating the app, leading to unnecessary backtracking instead of progressing to record the expense. Jade Green needs to focus on the "amountEditor" text field to input the amount of 15, select the appropriate asset and category using the "assetPicker" and "categoryPicker," and then press the "新增" button to save the expense.
Fill a focused textfield that has resource_id "amountEditor" with "15"
Jade Green pressed the back button because there was no interactable widgets

The focused textfield with resource_id "amountEditor" now displays the value "15", indicating that the user has successfully entered an amount into the field. Additionally, the layout remains consistent with various buttons and dropdown fields related to the financial entry, which may be slightly confusing due to the multiple options available without clear contextual guidance.
Touch on a dropdown field that has text "現金"

The dropdown field labeled "現金" has now become a checked button, indicating that it is the selected option, while a new button labeled "帳戶" has been added to the interface. This change may create confusion regarding the selection state if the UI does not clearly indicate the transition from a dropdown to a button.
Touch on a button that has text "帳戶"

After touching the button labeled "帳戶," a new button with the text "收入" appeared, while the previously checked button "現金" was removed. Additionally, a dropdown field labeled "資產" was introduced, indicating a change in the available options for the user.
